attributes.action: Unban GeoGuessr from Wymondham High school computers
attributes.additional_details: It is a right that should not be taken away from the pupils of Wymondham High and could be a harmful trend if we keep going on in this direction, as GeoGuessr possesses no reasonable harm to ban it. We are seeing a censorship that has to be ceased.
attributes.background: Force Wymondham High school into allowing us our fundamental right to be able to access GeoGuessr, especially for sixth formers during free periods.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what websites to allow students to visit are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
